## Description
The **Load documents (EI) **task allows load invoice metadata to the Documents Portal. It consumes the output of the **Manage invoices (EI) **task.

> Important

This task will not be executed if the Manage invoices (EI) task does not generate a documents output branch (see [Manage Invoices (EI) Batch Workflows Task Reference](/doxee-platform/docs/manage-invoices-ei-batch-workflow-task-reference)).

## Configuration
**![](data:image/png;base64,)**

- In the **Alias **field, enter the name of the task that will be displayed in the workflow.

## Input
The expected input of the Load documents (EI) task is the content of the **documents output branch **of the Manage invoices (EI) task:

- **Electronic invoice(s) **(JSON format)

## Output
None.
